joyful.title: Annunciation
joyful.shortDescription: Angel Gabriel visits Mary to announce she will bear Jesus.

joyful.title: Visitation
joyful.shortDescription: Mary visits Elizabeth who is pregnant with John the Baptist.

joyful.title: Presentation
joyful.shortDescription: Mary and Joseph present Jesus in the Temple.

joyful.title: Finding in the Temple
joyful.shortDescription: Mary and Joseph find young Jesus teaching in the Temple.

sorrowful.title: Agony in the Garden
sorrowful.shortDescription: Jesus prays in the Garden of Gethsemane before His arrest.

sorrowful.title: Scourging at the Pillar
sorrowful.shortDescription: Jesus is whipped before His crucifixion.

sorrowful.title: Crowning with Thorns
sorrowful.shortDescription: Jesus is mocked and crowned with thorns.

sorrowful.title: Carrying of the Cross
sorrowful.shortDescription: Jesus carries His cross to Golgotha.

sorrowful.title: Crucifixion
sorrowful.shortDescription: Jesus dies on the Cross for our salvation.

glorious.title: Descent of the Holy Spirit
glorious.shortDescription: Holy Spirit comes upon the Apostles.

glorious.title: Coronation of Mary
glorious.shortDescription: Mary is crowned Queen of Heaven.

luminous.title: Baptism of Jesus
luminous.shortDescription: Jesus is baptized in the Jordan River by John.

luminous.title: Wedding at Cana
luminous.shortDescription: Jesus performs His first miracle turning water into wine.

luminous.title: Proclamation of the Kingdom
luminous.shortDescription: Jesus proclaims the Kingdom of God and calls to conversion.

luminous.title: Transfiguration
luminous.shortDescription: Jesus is transfigured on the mountain before Peter, James, and John.

luminous.title: Institution of the Eucharist
luminous.shortDescription: Jesus gives us the Eucharist at the Last Supper.
